title: AG60095: Wasteland And Forest Management - Quick Facts
text:
AG60095
Course name | Wasteland And Forest Management
Offered by | Agricultural & Food Engineering
Credits | 4
L-T-P | 3-1-0
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | Spring

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Problems and prospects of wastelands development and management, technology for its identification and classification, technologies for management of wastelands. Type of forestry and forest resources-delineation and classification, ecological considerations, soil-water-nutrient-relationships, stand dynamics, growth and density, estimates of production, reproduction methods and generation, description and application of different systemsuniform, group strip, copping etc., preparation of management plans, regulation and controls, socio- economic aspects of forest resources development and management.
